name: 2 Spaceships
description:
Control 2 spaceships, the red one and the blue one, at the same time. Collect all the stars and avoid the barriers. Tap the left side of your device to control ship 1 between lanes 1-2 and the right side of your device to control ship 2 in lanes 3-4.

A great pick up and play game especially for children and younger players which will test their reaction and attentiveness, as well as help to improve their hand-eye coordination and make the hemispheres of their brain work together.
